{{Server client function}}

{{New feature/item|3.0132|1.3.2|5340|
This function performs a bitwise OR-conjunction on two or more (unsigned) 32-bit [[/Int.md|integers]]. See [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bitwise_operation#OR Bitwise operation] for more details.
}}

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
uint bitOr ( uint var1, uint var2, ... )
</syntaxhighlight>

===Required arguments===
*'''varN:''' The value you want to perform an OR-conjunction on

===Returns===
Returns the conjuncted value.

==Example==
This example will do a bitwise OR of x1, x2, ...
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
local x1 = 0x31 -- binary: 0011 0001
local x2 = 0x19 -- binary: 0001 1001

bitOr(x1, x2)   -- return  0011 1001
</syntaxhighlight>
